https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/h320E5Dr7Zgds15k1IYxx0VStav.jpg Out of one small London venue called The Blitz came a generation of outrageous teenagers, working class and art school kids, who would define the look, the sound, the style and the attitude of the '80s and beyond. This is their story. Blitzed!
